name: Missing: Game for a Cause
storyline: MISSING is a Role Playing Game designed to put players in the decision making seat and allow them to experience what a ‘missinggirl’ goes through when she is trafficked into cruel world of prostitution, a world into which millions of girls are lost every year. Players assume the role of the missing person, making choices and assessing risks for themselves to find their way to freedom.
summary: An experiential quest game allowing the player to get into the shoes of a missing girl
